034b837a-f8d1-43c3-b716-2f3bd3aa7f50.name: Hidebound
034b837a-f8d1-43c3-b716-2f3bd3aa7f50.notes: -2 penalty on any task that requires creativity or invention, including most rolls against Artist skill, all Engineer rolls for new inventions, and all skill rolls made to use the Gadgeteer advantage.

39a18fc9-9fa8-4355-8b3a-7d462514007a.name: Incurious
39a18fc9-9fa8-4355-8b3a-7d462514007a.notes: Make a self-control roll when confronted with something strange. If you fail, you ignore it!

features.situation: from others in any situation where No Sense of Humor becomes evident
